description:
This course was designed and created to provide a complete understanding to how couponing can be simple and highly effective.

Did you know that the average family of 4 spends over $800 per month in groceries, according the USA Today in 2013?

With these couponing techniques and lessons, you don't have to be EXTREME! You will learn exactly how to use coupons, match-ups, and other secret discounts that I have perfected for you in this course. So with just a few minutes per day you can eliminate up to 95% of that grocery bill. For the average family of 4, this results in a savings of up to $750 per month which is over $9000 per year!

Not only am I sharing all of the "tricks of the trade" that extreme couponers know and use, but I am also giving you access to my exclusive Coupon Tools that I created, such as my Store Checklists, Coupon Calculating Spreadsheet (eliminates all of the math for you, just plug in a few pieces of information and it will give you the final price, coupon value, % of savings, and more!), Secret Resources list, and more. These tools took me over 6 hours to create and tweak to perfection!

Why pay over $10,000 per year on groceries when you could be spending less than $1000?

About the Course:

Over 3 hours of teaching and hands on training. I give you information as well as show you exactly how to use it online.

I break down each section and then provide additional online training to make sure it all makes perfect sense. Even if you have experience (which is NOT necessary) you will learn how to take it to the next level.

By the end of this course, you will know exactly how to coupon effectively, efficiently, and have a lot of fun with it while saving a massive amount of money.

Who is this course for?

Anyone who wants to know the secrets of how extreme couponers save so much money on grocery bills.

Anyone who has no experience with coupons. Anyone who has experience with coupons but wants to learn and know the secrets of how to save even more and save your time.

Anyone who wants to save more money on groceries than a person working minimum wage would earn at a fast food job.
title: Extreme Couponing Mastercourse
